title: Steam App Id from game names configuration schema
description: Validates configuration input for the Steam App ID from game names script.

$schema.description: The JSON schema to use for the configuration file.

inputFile.description: The file to read the game names from.

fileName.description: The name of the file to read the game names from.

fileEnding.description: The file type of the input file. Choose from any of the supported file types listed.

delimiter.description: The delimiter between game names when reading the game names from the input file.

onlyFullMatches.description: Whether to only get Steam App ID's for full matches or also for partial matches. If set to false, partial matches will be saved to a different output file.
